quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: I prefer peace. But if trouble must come, let it come in my time, so that my children can live in peace.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: I refuse to accept the view that mankind is so tragically bound to the starless midnight of racism and war that the bright daybreak of peace and brotherhood can never become a reality... I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Never be in a hurry; do everything quietly and in a calm spirit. Do not lose your inner peace for anything whatsoever, even if your whole world seems upset.
author: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: If you want peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.
author: George Orwell

quote: A people free to choose will always choose peace.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Happiness, true happiness, is an inner quality. It is a state of mind. If your mind is at peace, you are happy. If your mind is at peace, but you have nothing else, you can be happy. If you have everything the world can give - pleasure, possessions, power - but lack peace of mind, you can never be happy.
author: Dada Vaswani

quote: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: You cannot find peace by avoiding life.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Peace is a journey of a thousand miles and it must be taken one step at a time.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: God cannot give us a happiness and peace apart from Himself, because it is not there. There is no such thing.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: The most valuable possession you can own is an open heart. The most powerful weapon you can be is an instrument of peace.
author: Carlos Santana

quote: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: Those who make peaceful revolution impossible will make violent revolution inevitable.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Peace and justice are two sides of the same coin.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Harmony makes small things grow, lack of it makes great things decay.
author: Sallust

quote: Peace is not an absence of war, it is a virtue, a state of mind, a disposition for benevolence, confidence, justice.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: A quiet mind cureth all.
author: Robert Burton

quote: Those who are at war with others are not at peace with themselves.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Peace of mind for five minutes, that's what I crave.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: Nobody can bring you peace but yourself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Imagine all the people living life in peace. You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us, and the world will be as one.
author: John Lennon

quote: We make war that we may live in peace.
author: Aristotle

quote: Nowhere can man find a quieter or more untroubled retreat than in his own soul.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: I believe in the religion of Islam. I believe in Allah and peace.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Mankind must remember that peace is not God's gift to his creatures; peace is our gift to each other.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: We are not at peace with others because we are not at peace with ourselves, and we are not at peace with ourselves because we are not at peace with God.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: Peace is liberty in tranquillity.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: It isn't enough to talk about peace. One must believe in it. And it isn't enough to believe in it. One must work at it.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: It is madness for sheep to talk peace with a wolf.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: You will find peace not by trying to escape your problems, but by confronting them courageously. You will find peace not in denial, but in victory.
author: J. Donald Walters

quote: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: We look forward to the time when the Power of Love will replace the Love of Power. Then will our world know the blessings of peace.
author: William E. Gladstone

quote: Every goal, every action, every thought, every feeling one experiences, whether it be consciously or unconsciously known, is an attempt to increase one's level of peace of mind.
author: Sydney Madwed

quote: The purpose of all wars, is peace.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: First keep peace with yourself, then you can also bring peace to others.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: Avoid popularity if you would have peace.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I am at peace with God. My conflict is with Man.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: We are bombarded on all sides by a vast number of messages we don't want or need. More information is generated in a single day than we can absorb in a lifetime. To fully enjoy life, all of us must find our own breathing space and peace of mind.
author: James E. Faust

quote: I took a deep breath and listened to the old bray of my heart. I am. I am. I am.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: I do not want the peace which passeth understanding, I want the understanding which bringeth peace.
author: Helen Keller

quote: A bad peace is even worse than war.
author: Tacitus

quote: People always make war when they say they love peace.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: You can find peace amidst the storms that threaten you.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: As I came to power peacefully, so shall I keep it.
author: Corazon Aquino

quote: Complete peace equally reigns between two mental waves.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: If they want peace, nations should avoid the pin-pricks that precede cannon shots.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Democracy is necessary to peace and to undermining the forces of terrorism.
author: Benazir Bhutto

quote: Peace is a day-to-day problem, the product of a multitude of events and judgments. Peace is not an 'is,' it is a 'becoming.'
author: Haile Selassie

quote: I'm concentrating on staying healthy, having peace, being happy, remembering what is important, taking in nature and animals, spending time reading, trying to understand the universe, where science and the spiritual meet.
author: Joan Jett

quote: Peace is when time doesn't matter as it passes by.
author: Maria Schell

quote: Power to the peaceful!
author: Michael Franti

quote: Yes, we love peace, but we are not willing to take wounds for it, as we are for war.
author: John Holmes
